fields.description:
During standard install in eucaconsole CI the console installs but authentication fails. https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1849 is a possible culprit.
Errors seen during source build:

{code}
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/models/auth.py:59: DeprecationWarning: authenticated_userid: As of Pyramid 1.5 the "pyramid.security.authenticated_userid" API is now deprecated.  It will be removed in Pyramid 1.8.  Use the "authenticated_userid" attribute of th
e Pyramid request instead.
  from pyramid.security import Authenticated, authenticated_userid
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/forms/elbs.py:60: DeprecationWarning: Required is going away in WTForms 3.0, use DataRequired
  super(BucketInfoRequired, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/forms/elbs.py:49: DeprecationWarning: Required is going away in WTForms 3.0, use DataRequired
  super(PingPathRequired, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/forms/elbs.py:71: DeprecationWarning: Required is going away in WTForms 3.0, use DataRequired
  super(CertificateARNRequired, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/forms/elbs.py:592: DeprecationWarning: Required is going away in WTForms 3.0, use DataRequired
  super(PredefinedPolicyRequired, self).__init__(*args, **kwargs)
Starting server in PID 19810.
!!!
!!! WARNING: This command is deprecated.
!!! 
!!!     You should now use the `--paste` option. Ex.:
!!! 
!!!         gunicorn --paste development.ini
!!!     
!!!

[2016-03-24 13:57:47 +0000] [19810] [INFO] Starting gunicorn 19.4.5
[2016-03-24 13:57:47 +0000] [19810] [INFO] Listening at: http://0.0.0.0:8888 (19810)
[2016-03-24 13:57:47 +0000] [19810] [INFO] Using worker: eventlet
[2016-03-24 13:57:47 +0000] [19816] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 19816
[2016-03-24 13:57:47 +0000] [19817] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 19817
[2016-03-24 13:57:47 +0000] [19818] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 19818
[2016-03-24 13:57:47 +0000] [19819] [INFO] Booting worker with pid: 19819
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/wtforms/fields/core.py:350: DeprecationWarning: The TextField alias for StringField has been deprecated and will be removed in WTForms 3.0
  return self.field_class(*self.args, **kw)
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/wtforms/fields/core.py:350: DeprecationWarning: The TextField alias for StringField has been deprecated and will be removed in WTForms 3.0
  return self.field_class(*self.args, **kw)
[2016-03-24 13:59:35 +0000] [19816] [ERROR] Error handling request /login?login_type=Eucalyptus
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/async.py", line 52, in handle
    self.handle_request(listener_name, req, client, addr)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/async.py", line 105, in handle_request
    respiter = self.wsgi(environ, resp.start_response)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 223, in __call__
    response = self.invoke_subrequest(request, use_tweens=True)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 198, in invoke_subrequest
    response = handle_request(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 102, in __call__
    response = self.handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 58, in tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 47, in tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/tweens.py", line 20, in excview_tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 145, in handle_request
    view_name
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/view.py", line 541, in _call_view
    response = view_callable(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 602, in __call__
    return view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 328, in attr_view
    return view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 304, in predicate_wrapper
    return view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 353, in rendered_view
    result = view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 483, in _class_requestonly_view
    response = getattr(inst, attr)()
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/views/login.py", line 147, in handle_login
    return self.handle_euca_login()
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/views/login.py", line 167, in handle_euca_login
    new_passwd=new_passwd, timeout=8, duration=self.duration)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/models/auth.py", line 353, in authenticate
    return self._authenticate_(account, user, passwd, new_passwd, timeout, duration)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/models/auth.py", line 379, in _authenticate_
    context = ssl._create_unverified_context()
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute '_create_unverified_context'
{code}

comments.body:
This issue surfaced when we removed the try/except approach that guarded against the missing ssl unverified context method (which is missing in Python < 2.7.9).  See https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1849/files#diff-f9073a1c75a7a29c613e04d4e564e4a2L210 in PR 1849

Unfortunately we didn't catch that oversight during code review.

I tried a source install on centos6 from latest master. I could not authenticate and got this error in stack trace:

{code}
/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/wtforms/fields/core.py:350: DeprecationWarning: The TextField alias for StringField has been deprecated and will be removed in WTForms 3.0
  return self.field_class(*self.args, **kw)
[2016-03-24 19:20:46 +0000] [18794] [ERROR] Error handling request /login?login_type=Eucalyptus
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/async.py", line 52, in handle
    self.handle_request(listener_name, req, client, addr)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/gunicorn/workers/async.py", line 105, in handle_request
    respiter = self.wsgi(environ, resp.start_response)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 223, in __call__
    response = self.invoke_subrequest(request, use_tweens=True)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 198, in invoke_subrequest
    response = handle_request(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 102, in __call__
    response = self.handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 58, in tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/tweens.py", line 47, in tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/tweens.py", line 20, in excview_tween
    response = handler(request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/router.py", line 145, in handle_request
    view_name
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/view.py", line 541, in _call_view
    response = view_callable(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 602, in __call__
    return view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 328, in attr_view
    return view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 304, in predicate_wrapper
    return view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 353, in rendered_view
    result = view(context, request)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/pyramid/config/views.py", line 483, in _class_requestonly_view
    response = getattr(inst, attr)()
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/views/login.py", line 147, in handle_login
    return self.handle_euca_login()
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/views/login.py", line 167, in handle_euca_login
    new_passwd=new_passwd, timeout=8, duration=self.duration)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/models/auth.py", line 353, in authenticate
    return self._authenticate_(account, user, passwd, new_passwd, timeout, duration)
  File "/user-console-workspace/eucaconsole-virtualenv/lib/python2.6/site-packages/eucaconsole/models/auth.py", line 380, in _authenticate_
    conn = httplib.HTTPSConnection(host, self.port, timeout=timeout, context=context)
TypeError: __init__() got an unexpected keyword argument 'context'

{code}

I built custom packages from GUI-2497:  http://ci.eucalyptus.com/view/Builds%20(old)/job/p1-console-build-custom-s03-rpm/lastSuccessfulBuild/artifact/results/eucaconsole-4.2.2-0.0.8775.49.20160324gita6343ac.el6.noarch.rpm

I installed these packages on the ufs host of console CI multicluster: 10.111.1.73 

I still see Internal error on login. I have seen the following errors in the log: 
{code}

Still seeing the error on authentication.

Hmm, I poked around 10.111.1.73 and the console process doesn't seem to handle stop/restart requests...

{code}
[root@d-03 log]# service eucaconsole restart
Stopping eucaconsole nginx:                                [  OK  ]
Stopping eucaconsole memcached:                            [  OK  ]
Stopping eucaconsole:                                      [FAILED]
Starting eucaconsole nginx:                                [  OK  ]
Starting eucaconsole memcached:                            [  OK  ]
Starting eucaconsole:                                      [  OK  ]
[root@d-03 log]# service eucaconsole stop
Stopping eucaconsole nginx:                                [  OK  ]
Stopping eucaconsole memcached:                            [  OK  ]
Stopping eucaconsole:                                      [FAILED]
{code}

[~alice]: I manually killed the eucaconsole process (via repeated kill -9 <PID>) and restarted the console on 10.111.1.73 and it seems fine now, so there's something screwy with our stop/restart scripts and we should probably open a separate ticket for that.  But for now PR 1861 appears to fix this ticket and unblocks QA, so feel free to merge that when you have the chance.

/cc [~ccassler], [~mbacchi]
Source install works in CI! Merging fix.
